scripts.install-bundles: npm --prefix test-apps/angular install && npm --prefix test-apps/react install
scripts.prepare-test-apps: npm run bundle-packages && npm run install-bundles && npm run copy-angular-icons
scripts.lint: eslint . && npm --prefix packages/react run lint && npm --prefix packages/angular run lint
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --fix && npm --prefix packages/react run lint:fix && npm --prefix packages/angular run lint:fix
scripts.test:all: npm --prefix packages/react run test && npm --prefix packages/angular run test
scripts.generate-icons: npm --prefix packages/react run generate-icons && npm --prefix packages/angular run generate-icons
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix packages/react run build && npm --prefix packages/angular run build
